list.name: Changes
list.comment: refactor: migrate configuration to .env and improve code qualityMajor refactoring to improve security, maintainability, and code quality:Configuration:- Migrate from XML to .env files for better security- Add .env.example template with comprehensive documentation- Update get_data() to prioritize .env over XML fallback- Remove data.xml (backed up as data.xml.backup)Code Quality:- Fix API actions: POST/PUT now correctly send JSON instead of strings- Fix driver initialization: properly set module-level variables for imports- Add type hints to common_ops.py and api_actions.py- Make headless mode configurable via HEADLESS env variable- Fix fixture scoping to reuse browser for parametrized testsBug Fixes:- Fix driver NoneType errors in ui_actions.py- Fix API key loading with proper fallback handling- Improve Appium server URL construction (supports APPIUM_SERVER or HOST+PORT)Performance Testing:- Add Locust-based performance tests (test_cases/test_performance/)- Implement performance monitoring with system resource tracking- Add performance reporting utilities (HTML, CSV, JSON exports)- Configure performance tests to use .env for host and API keyDocker Support:- Add comprehensive Dockerfile for containerized test execution- Add docker-compose.yml for easy test orchestration- Support for Android emulator and Appium in containers- Automated test execution script in Docker environmentDocumentation:- Add comprehensive docstrings to key functions- Create .env.example with detailed comments- Update .gitignore to exclude .env filesBreaking Changes: None - XML fallback still works for backward compatibility

task.summary: - Delayed electron_flows further for better test comprehension - Fixed some typos in test_electron

refactor: migrate configuration to .env and improve code qualityMajor refactoring to improve security, maintainability, and code quality:Configuration:- Migrate from XML to .env files for better security- Add .env.example template with comprehensive documentation- Update get_data() to prioritize .env over XML fallback- Remove data.xml (backed up as data.xml.backup)Code Quality:- Fix API actions: POST/PUT now correctly send JSON instead of strings- Fix driver initialization: properly set module-level variables for imports- Add type hints to common_ops.py and api_actions.py- Make headless mode configurable via HEADLESS env variable- Fix fixture scoping to reuse browser for parametrized testsBug Fixes:- Fix driver NoneType errors in ui_actions.py- Fix API key loading with proper fallback handling- Improve Appium server URL construction (supports APPIUM_SERVER or HOST+PORT)Performance Testing:- Add Locust-based performance tests (test_cases/test_performance/)- Implement performance monitoring with system resource tracking- Add performance reporting utilities (HTML, CSV, JSON exports)- Configure performance tests to use .env for host and API keyDocker Support:- Add comprehensive Dockerfile for containerized test execution- Add docker-compose.yml for easy test orchestration- Support for Android emulator and Appium in containers- Automated test execution script in Docker environmentDocumentation:- Add comprehensive docstrings to key functions- Create .env.example with detailed comments- Update .gitignore to exclude .env filesBreaking Changes: None - XML fallback still works for backward compatibility

MESSAGE.value: - Delayed electron_flows further for better test comprehension - Fixed some typos in test_electron
